Cooking.title: Handwashing
Cooking.description: Handwashing is very important to kill bacetria before handling food.
Cooking.remember: Remember to wash your hands before, after, and even during cooking

Cooking.title: Cross Contamination
Cooking.description: Different utencils and surfaces should be used for different foods so bacetria is not transfered
Cooking.remember: Remember never to handle things like raw meat near items that will not be cooked

Cooking.title: Food Temperatures
Cooking.description: Different foods must be stored and cooked at different temperatures to be safe
Cooking.remember: Remember to check tempratures when cooking and store items that must be cold in a refrigirator or freezer
